attributes.action: Give Walter Smith OBE a Knighthood for services to Football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Walter Smith is the epitome of what a football manager should be and a shining example to anyone wanting to get into football. He took Glasgow Rangers to the uefa cup final in Manchester which saw the biggest mobilisation of football supporters in history!! He overseen Rangers nine in a row success and has been involved in football since 1966 with Dundee United,Dumbarton,Everton,Manchester United,Rangers,Scotland Youths and 1st team!! He is the modern day William Struth and is worthy of the highest decoration from the country!!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
